div.div: Morrisville St. Coll vs. SUNY Cortland
at Cortland, NY | Cortland Stadium Red

tr.td: Morrisville wins toss, defers. Cortland receives. Morr. defends south
Jed Lamont kickoff 46 yards to the CORTLAND24, Bill Smith return 21 yards to the CORTLAND45 (Marcus Babb).
